en_US {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%a%N%f%N%d%N%b%N%h %s %e %r%N%%T %z%N%c%N" }
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "840" }
    CountryNumber { "840" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "$",
            "USD ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "English locale for the USA" }
        Source { "Free Software Foundation, Inc." }
        Address { "59 Temple Place - Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307, USA" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "English" }
        Territory { "USA" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-24" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "eng" }
    Measurement { "American" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c (%a) %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "11" }
        InternationalPrefix { "1" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "AM",
                    "PM",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
                    "MMMM/dd/yyyy",
                    "MMMM/dd/yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Sun",
                            "Mon",
                            "Tue",
                            "Wed",
                            "Thu",
                            "Fri",
                            "Sat",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Sunday",
                            "Monday",
                            "Tuesday",
                            "Wednesday",
                            "Thursday",
                            "Friday",
                            "Saturday",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Jan",
                            "Feb",
                            "Mar",
                            "Apr",
                            "May",
                            "Jun",
                            "Jul",
                            "Aug",
                            "Sep",
                            "Oct",
                            "Nov",
                            "Dec",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "January",
                            "February",
                            "March",
                            "April",
                            "May",
                            "June",
                            "July",
                            "August",
                            "September",
                            "October",
                            "November",
                            "December",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
